section.p:
You spend a couple of months with the outlaws, during which time you have many opportunities to hone your questionable skills.
Increase your THIEVERY score by 1 . Your share of the loot amounts to .
At last you decide the time has come to move on; many other adventures await you. The outlaws are all hard men, but they have learned to look up to you. Several shed genuine tears to see you leave. .
